mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menus (menu_name, menu_price, shop_id, menu_stock, menu_info, menu_category) VALUES (#{menuName}, #{menuPrice}, #{shopId}, #{menuStock}, #{menuInfo}, #{menuCategory})
mapper.select: SELECT IF(COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM menus WHERE menu_name = #{menuName} AND shop_id = #{shopId}
